name: Psycho Shoot
overview: They roar above your head, as you turn while raising your gun, and fire three sharp bursts in the direction of the sound. There is nothing there. They have disappeared! The psychos are on the loose tonight. Destroying, wreacking havoc, terrifying the defenseless citizenry. But not you. You are part of the elite urban-defenders, and you are going to rid the streets of these mad men... forever. PSYCHO SHOOT - a game of madness, marksmanship and timing.
